caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. DONNA BROWN, Appellant.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Onondaga County Court, Burke, J.
opinion.opinion_text: Adjudication unanimously affirmed. Counsel's application to withdraw granted (see People v Crawford, 71 A.D.2d 38).
